Lexington-Fayette.Hamburg Pavilion: Hamburg Pavilion is a regional shopping center located along I-75 and Man o' War Boulevard in Lexington, Kentucky. It is one of the state's largest shopping centers with 1,040,000 square feet (97,000 m2) of retail space and is continuing to be developed. The shopping center is anchored by Target, Kohl's, Dick's Sporting Goods, Regal Cinemas, Barnes & Noble, and Best Buy.
